mapper.select: select member_id, email, nickname, avatar_now from members where email=#{email} and password=hex(aes_encrypt(#{password}, 'human'))
select avatar_id, name, img from members m, avatar a where m.member_id=#{member_id} and m.avatar_now=a.avatar_id
select a.avatar_id, name, img from gets g, avatar a where g.member_id=#{member_id} and g.avatar_id=a.avatar_id
select avatar_id, name, img from avatar where avatar_id not in (select avatar_id from gets where member_id=#{member_id})
